views.view_definition: SELECT u.user_id, u.email, u.created_at, p.profile_status FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.is_active = true
views.comment: View showing active users with their profile status

views.view_definition: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', order_date) as month, product_category, SUM(order_amount) as total_sales, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM sales_orders WHERE order_status = 'completed' GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', order_date), product_category
views.comment: Monthly sales summary by product category

views.view_definition: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category, i.quantity_available, i.last_inventory_update, CASE WHEN i.quantity_available < 10 THEN 'LOW_STOCK' WHEN i.quantity_available = 0 THEN 'OUT_OF_STOCK' ELSE 'IN_STOCK' END as stock_status FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id
views.comment: Current inventory status with stock level indicators
